mapper.insert: insert into board (title, memberId, content) values (#{title}, #{memberId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select ceil(count(boardNo)/25) pages from board where ${fkey} like #{fval}
mapper.update: update board set readcount = readcount + 1 where boardNo = #{boardNo}
